name: DigitalReceiver
tagline: Python 2.7 GNU/Radio-based script which collects and plots data samples
body:
Python 2.7 GNU/Radio-based scripts used to collect data from USRP digital receiver (left panel), process it using SciPy, and display it using matplotlib (right panel). Loosely based on [M.Yamamoto's procedures](http://www.rish.kyoto-u.ac.jp/digitalbeacon/sub1.html).
![DigitalReceiver preview](http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z449/dshatski/Stuff/DigitalReceiver_zps588876cb.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
